== Command list of pichi bot ==
 * *!log n* - Show log of messages
 * *!wtf name* - show definition from db-wiki
 * *!wtfcount* - count all wiki pages
 * *!wtfrand* - show random page
 * *!top* - show top 10 of words in database
 * *!talkers* - top 10 user activities
 * *!count* - count words lexemes
 * *!dfn name=val* - set definition to db-wiki
 * *!set name=val* - set pichi option
 * *!gc [name]* - show available options
 * *!users [nick|jid]* - show users list
 * *!msg [nick|jid|room] message [type]* - send message from bot to user
 * *!ping [nick|jid]* - ping request to user
 * *!join room nick [status]* - join room (or change nick)
 * *!left room nick [status]* - leave the room
 * *!greet jid room@server greet* - Message to main, when user enter the room
 * *!farewell jid room@server buy* - Message to main, when user lefts the room
 * *!idle nick* - time of nick silence.
 * *!quit* - quit :)
 * *!version* - show version of bot

=== admin commands: ===
!set, !gc, !msg, !join, !left, !quit

=== available syntaxis of commands ===
 * !command arg=set
 * !command option_1 option_2 ... option_N (without spaces in words)
 * !command "option 1" "option 2" ... "option N" (with spaces)
